body.section: The following section describes each task from the standard task library that is supplied with the Distributed Workflow Architecture (DWFA) framework. The tasks appear below sorted by task purpose.
body.note: The documentation for these tasks has been generated automatically from collections of source code. There may be some tasks described here that are not available within a given application bundle. Conversely, there may be application bundles that include some tasks whose documentation is not included here.
body.section: A task represents the instructions and data requirements for a single piece of work to be undertaken by a person or software process. The tasks available within the IHTSDO Workbench IDE determine how well the editor can meet the workflow requirements for terminology development.
